title: Drawing, "study of female figure holding flowers", 1872–79
medium:
recto: Black, red, white chalk on salmon-pink wove paper

Verso: black, white chalk, graphite
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
creditline: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
description:
Vertical rectangle. Obverse: Full-length figure of a young woman in costume, standing, turned toward the right. She holds a flower in her hand. 

Reverse: study of drapery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "study of female figure holding flowers", 1872–79.
1872–79. recto: Black, red, white chalk on salmon-pink wove paper

Verso: black, white chalk, graphite. Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters. 1955-38-34.
